net.sf.jclal.activelearning.multilabel.querystrategy

Class MultiLabelMMCQueryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.querystrategy.AbstractQueryStrategy
      • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.multilabel.querystrategy.AbstractMultiLabelQueryStrategy
        • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.multilabel.querystrategy.MultiLabelMMCQueryStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, IQueryStrategy, JCLAL

    public class MultiLabelMMCQueryStrategy
extends AbstractMultiLabelQueryStrategy
    Implementation of MMC (Maximal loss reduction with maximal confidence) active strategy. See for more information Yang, B., Sun, J., Wang, T., and Chen, Z. (2009). Effective Multi-Label Active Learning for Text Classification. KDD-09.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
